```{r}
library(readxl)
library(readr)
library(purrr)
library(janitor)
```

```{r}
map_dfr(
  .x = excel_sheets("ins/cnsf_val_dg.xlsx"),
  .f = ~ read_xlsx("ins/cnsf_val_dg.xlsx", sheet = .x) %>% 
    mutate(riesgo = str_sub(.x, -3, -1), 
           .before = 1
           ) %>% 
    clean_names()
) %>% 
  mutate(clean_campo = make_clean_names(campo)) %>% 
  write_rds("ins/cat_cnsf_dg_base")


```
